data.name: Slayaway Camp - Supernatural Forces Killer Pack
data.detailed_description:
Introducing the SUPERNATURAL FORCES killer pack! A brand new pack of PREMIUM Slayaway Camp killers, each with their own special effects, kill animation, and psychotic tendencies. Purchase of this DLC will instantly grant you each of the following killers...

FLAMING SKULLFACE

Nothing says "I'm pure evil, bro, so step off" like wearing a leather jacket and having a head that is eternally engulfed in flames. Comes with his super badass special kill: CHOPPERED.

SUPERNATURAL OCCURRENCE

Typically only visible in handy cam night vision, this supernatural spirit is the epitome of shadowy darkness. Comes with their super special kill: DISINHABITED & applies a hard-mode night vision filter across the full game.

WRAITH

Tired of waiting for people's time to die, this wraith has taken the cause into his own hands. Hovers above the ground with a floaty cloak of pure unimaginable darkness. Comes with his super special kill: FAILED SAVING THROW.

SUMERIAN DEMON

Your run of the mill, average, every-day hell-spawn Sumerian demon with the heaviest of heavy metal animated flaming wings. Comes with its super special kill: TOASTY!

YETI

A mountain snow beast come down from the icy slopes to smash some heads in. Features real patented RasterVox™ fur and brutally frozen falling ice crystals of death. Comes with its super special kill: SNOW JOKE!

PLUS: KEVIN

It's... just... well.. it's Kevin.

data.short_description: Slayaway Camp's first official Premium Killer pack, each with their own special effects, kill animation, and psychotic tendencies.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.
